name: Spotify Playlist Covers
description:
Customize your Spotify playlists with these comprehensive album covers. Visually represent useful information in a single image. Includes: 


  1. Artist image previews.
  2. Genre tag clouds.
  3. Total number of songs & run time.
  4. Playlist & creator info.
  5. Type of playlist. (Individual or collaborative.)
  6. Playlist mood. (Using emojis as variants.) 


Emoji credit: Microsoft Design


-

Jello (@madewithjello)
